name: Renovate
description: Keep npm dependencies up-to-date with Pull Requests

RENOVATE_REPOS.description: Comma-separated list of repositories, e.g. singapore/repo1,singapore/repo2

RENOVATE_PACKAGE_FILES.description: Comma-separated list of package file paths to renovate

RENOVATE_IGNORE_DEPS.description: Comma-separated list of dependencies to ignore

RENOVATE_LABELS.description: Comma-separated list of labels to add to created Pull Requests

RECREATE_PRS.description: Recreate PRs even if matching ones were previously closed
